title: Lincoln Electric Leather Welding Gloves KH641, Premium Hand Protection from Welder and Cutting Torch Heat, Commercial Quality, Cotton Lined, Gauntlet Cuff, Unisex, Grey, One Size
descriptions:
**Title:**
Lincoln Electric Leather Welding Gloves KH641 - Your Ultimate Protection for MIG and Stick Welding

**Description:**
Step up your welding game with the Lincoln Electric Leather Welding Gloves KH641, crafted for the serious welder and crafted to stand the test of time. These premium gloves are designed to offer heavy-duty protection and are perfect for MIG and stick welding applications.

**Key Features:**
- **Heat & Flame Resistance:** Protect your hands from the intense heat of welding and flames, ensuring you stay safe during your projects.
- **Cotton Lining:** Cotton fleece lining provides comfort and warmth, keeping your hands safe and dry.
- **Durable Construction:** Fully welted seams and lock-stitch construction make these gloves incredibly durable and long-lasting.
- **Kevlar Stitching:** Reinforced with Kevlar stitching, these gloves are built to withstand the toughest conditions.
- **Winged Thumb Design:** The winged thumb design offers improved dexterity and control, allowing you to reach and manipulate tools with ease.
- **Gauntlet Cuff:** A 13.5-inch gauntlet cuff ensures that your wrists are fully protected, adding an extra layer of defense.
- **Unisex One Size:** Designed to fit most hands, these gloves are a versatile choice for both men and women.
- **Chemical Resistance:** These gloves are also resistant to chemicals, making them suitable for a wide range of industrial applications.

**Applications:**
- MIG Welding
- Stick Welding

**Package Contents:**
- 1 Pair of Lincoln Electric Leather Welding Gloves KH641, Grey

**Color:**

**Style:**
